original_text: I pray that God will punish my enemies as he punishes all wicked people. They do bad things to me, so they deserve punishment. I pray that God will punish my enemies
korean_text: 나의 원수는 악인 같이 되고 일어나 나를 치는 자는 불의한 자 같이 되기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: I pray that God will punish my enemies
as he punishes all wicked people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 모든 악한 사람들을 벌하시는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: They do bad things to me

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 벌을 받을 자격이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: I pray that God will punish my enemies
